trigger.Name: trSpawnMiniBoss
trigger.script:
if not GetEntityByName("Boss") then local RandModel = { "MiniBossRidzin_molokovoz01", "MiniBossRidzin_cruiser01", "MiniBossRidzin_ural01", "MiniBossRidzin_molokovoz02" }
local StartCoord = CVector(2449.622, 107.184, 5093.514)
local Belong = 1002
local r = random(4) local model = RandModel[r]
TeamCreateWithWarez("Boss", Belong, StartCoord, {model}, nil, 0)
local WayPoints = { CVector(2233.958, 90.802, 4116.054), CVector(1098.860, 81.422, 3549.603), CVector(2259.773, 77.362, 1919.475), CVector(2652.065, 112.107, 1087.990), StartCoord }
local tt = GetEntityByName("Boss") if tt then local items = {"oil", "machinery", "fuel", "oil","fuel","fuel","machinery"} local items_count = table.getn(items) local selected_item = items[random(1, items_count)] GetEntityByName("Boss_vehicle_0"):AddItemsToRepository(selected_item, 3) if EXTRAGADGETS ~= nil and EXTRAGADGETS == true then local ValuableExtraItems = {"extra_fuel_tank","extra_durability","cooling_system_explosion","cooling_system_guns2","firing_rate_energy2","add_damage_guns2","additional_torque2","additional_durability2","add_damage_energy","grouping_angle_guns","additional_torque","maxim01","flag01","omega01","book","book"} local ValuableExtraItemsCount = table.getn(ValuableExtraItems) local SelectedValuableExtraItems = ValuableExtraItems[random(1,ValuableExtraItemsCount)] GetEntityByName("Boss_vehicle_0"):AddItemsToRepository(SelectedValuableExtraItems, 1) else local ValuableItems = {"cooling_system_explosion","cooling_system_guns2","firing_rate_energy2","add_damage_guns2","additional_torque2","additional_durability2","add_damage_energy","grouping_angle_guns","additional_torque","maxim01","flag01","omega01","book","book"} local ValuableItemsCount = table.getn(ValuableItems) local SelectedValuableItems = ValuableItems[random(1,ValuableItemsCount)] GetEntityByName("Boss_vehicle_0"):AddItemsToRepository(SelectedValuableItems, 1) end tt:StackOpen() for i, point in ipairs(WayPoints) do tt:SetDestination(point) end tt:StackLoop() tt:StackClose() end end
